<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <citation>
        <layout>
            <choose>
                <if type="article-journal">
                    <choose>
                        <if variable="title">
		                    <text variable="container-title" form="long"/>
                        </if>
                        <else>
                            <text variable="container-title" form="short"/>
                        </else>
                    </choose>
                </if>
                <else>
                    <text variable="container-title"/>
                </else>
            </choose>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
